messages.title: RESTORING TRUST IN POLITICS
messages.content: Sian Flynn shares her commitments to transparency, detailing her intentions regarding the management and reporting of MPs' expenses to restore trust in politics.

messages.title: MPs' expenses: my contract with you
messages.content: As the Parliamentary Candidate for North Cornwall, Sian Flynn promises to publish details of all expenses, appoint a local firm of auditors to approve expenses, publish a list of all donors of more than £1,000, and meet her own tax liabilities such as stamp duty without claims from the taxpayer.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Sian Flynn commits to full transparency with her expenses if elected, including the publication of detailed expense reports and the appointment of a local auditor.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: David Cameron, Gordon Brown, Nick Clegg

issues.governance: The issue of MPs' expenses and the need to restore trust in politics is highlighted.

leaflet.personalStatement: Sian Flynn expresses an understanding of public frustration over trust in politicians and shares her commitments to earning trust by adhering to rules and not breaking the law.

quotes.text: I can understand people feeling like that - MPs from all parties have abused the trust we place in them.

images.caption: Sian Flynn, Conservative Parliamentary Candidate North Cornwall

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet contains a survey section with questions regarding the reform of MPs' expenses and opinions on party leaders' responses to the expenses scandal.
